abstract: Belgium defeats Hungary, 4-0, to reach quarterfinals of European Championship.
lead_paragraph: Minutes after an impressive assist, Hazard beat several defenders for a spectacular goal, sending Belgium to a quarterfinal meeting with Wales.

headline.main: Eden Hazard Turns Heads in a Late Belgium Flurry
headline.print_headline: Hazard Turns Heads  in Late Belgium Flurry

snippet: Minutes after an impressive assist, Hazard beat several defenders for a spectacular goal, sending Belgium to a quarterfinal meeting with Wales.
